title: How often should I clean a MacBook Pro from dust? - Quora

response.answer_text: I actually have a cloth from a company called Radtech. It is a cloth that can go between the keyboard and the screen on my computer, and I use it when I close the computer. When I open it, I wipe the screen off quickly, since my purpose for opening the computer is not to clean it, and I get on with using it. As for the keys, and more specifically getting dust in the keys, I use an air duster to clean the keys once a month, but I utilize both to keep my computer clean. The cloth from Radtech is machine washable, but mine is usually good after going over it on both sides with a lint roller. It’s a very nice cloth.
Best advice: when you think it needs to be cleaned/dusted. It’s your Mac!
